info.title: Groups API
info.description: The University API implementation for the Group Reference Object.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of administrators for a group
Retrieves a specific administrator of a group

put.summary: Changes a collection of administrators for a group

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of members for a group
Retrieves a specific member of a group

put.summary: Changes a collection of members for a group

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of related groups for a group

put.summary: Changes a specific related group for a group

delete.summary: Deletes a specific related group for a group

put.summary: Changes a specific related group for a group

delete.summary: Deletes a specific related group for a group

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of resource groups for a group
Retrieves a specific resource_group of a group

put.summary: Changes a collection of resource_groups for a group

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of members for a group

default_subset_size.description: Unless overridden in query parameters, this endpoint will return this number of resources in each subset.

max_subset_size.description: The largest number of resources this API can return in one subset.

subset_start.description: The offset (zero based) from the beginning of the collection of the first instance in this subset.

subset_size.description: The number of instances in this subset.

field_sets_returned.description: JSON array of all the field_sets represented in this result. May be different from the list of field_sets requested in the query string.

field_sets_available.description: JSON array of all available field_sets available to request for this resource. A consumer may not have access to all field_sets in this array.

field_sets_default.description: The field_sets that will be returned if no field_sets query parameter is specified.

group_lookup.description: Case insensitive, accepts wild cards (*), does a contains search of text

employee_role.description: The employee type, validated through the meta/employee_role service

net_id.description: The user name to used for authentication to BYU web applications
The user name to used for authentication to BYU web applications

search_text.name: search_text
search_text.description: The text to search for in the specified context.

group_tag.name: group_tag
group_tag.description: Filter groups by tag (Formerly known as group attributes)

group_id.name: group_id
group_id.description: The ID of the Group, case insensitive

resource_id.name: resource_id
resource_id.description: The ID of the resource group

byu_id.name: byu_id
byu_id.description: The BYU ID of the Identity

implied_group_id.name: implied_group_id
implied_group_id.description: The ID of the Implied Group

required_group_id.name: required_group_id
required_group_id.description: The ID of the Required Group

relationship_types.name: relationship_types
relationship_types.description: Filter by relationship_type in related groups

member_byu_id.name: members.byu_id
member_byu_id.description: The BYU ID of the Identity

administrator_byu_id.name: administrators.byu_id
administrator_byu_id.description: The BYU ID of the Identity

subset_start_offset.name: subset_start_offset
subset_start_offset.description: The offset for the first resource in the collection to be returned in this subset.

subset_size.name: subset_size
subset_size.description: The number of resources in the collection to return (defaults to the value of max_subset_size).

subset_start_key.name: subset_start_key
subset_start_key.description: The primary key of the resource to start the subset with. Optional alternative to subset_start_offset.

field_sets.name: field_sets
field_sets.description: Used to specify which field sets you would like returned in the collection

modify_group_body.name: modify_group_body
modify_group_body.description: The JSON body for adding or updating a group

example.group_description: This group is a sample group for the Groups API

modify_member_body.name: modify_members_body
modify_member_body.description: The JSON body for adding or updating the members of a group

modify_administrator_body.name: modify_administrators_body
modify_administrator_body.description: The JSON body for adding or updating an administrator

admin_type.description: (R)ead type allows admin to view all admins and members, (A)dmin allows read rights plus add and remove group members, (O)wner all of admin rights plus modify group attributes and add or remove other admins

modify_related_group_body.name: modify_related_group_body
modify_related_group_body.description: The JSON body for adding or updating a related group

tags.name: administrators
tags.description: The Groups API sub-resource used to retrieve the group administrators.

tags.name: members
tags.description: The Groups API sub-resource used to retrieve the group members.

tags.name: related_groups
tags.description: The Groups API sub-resource used to retrieve the related groups (ie, implied groups, required, etc.).

tags.name: resource_groups
tags.description: The Groups API sub-resource used to retrieve the resource groups (ie, links that appear in my.byu.edu).
